projects.title: Projects!
projects.description: I have made a variaty of stuff, most of which is never going to see the light of day. Regardless, take a look at a few projects. Some are complete, some are not so complete, most of them are even open source! Make sure to check out the tags to see if they are my faviorite :star: You might even be able to read what tech i used for it all
